forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and becoming windy. Low 14C. SSE winds at 15 to 25 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and becoming windy. Low 57F. SSE winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. High 17C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. High 63F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times early. Low 13C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain. The rain may be heavy at times early. Low around 55F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers developing in the afternoon. Potential for flooding rains. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Potential for flooding rains. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Potential for flooding rains. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Potential for flooding rains. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 16C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
